events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and are excited to review your credentials.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department based on your experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out soon.
The initial screening for the software engineering position has been completed successfully, and we are impressed with your background.
Thank you for your prompt response regarding the initial screening; we appreciate your enthusiasm for the engineer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week to further assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
You have successfully completed the technical interview; the panel was pleased with your solutions and approach.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your fit within the company culture and the benefits associated with the engineer role.
The HR interview was conducted smoothly, and the team is confident you would be a great addition to our engineering department.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the software engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer; we are excited about the possibility of you joining our engineering team.
We are thrilled to hear that you have accepted the offer and look forward to your contributions as a software engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun; welcome to the engineering team and the start of an exciting journey.
The recruitment process for the software engineer position is now closed successfully with you joining our engineering department.
